import React from "react"; import "./intro.css"; import bg from "../../assets/images/linhImg.png"; import { Link } from "react-scroll"; const Intro = () => { return (

Hello,

I'm Linh Klatt

As an enthusiastic and dedicated software engineering student, I am passionate about creating and maintaining innovative web applications and services. With a strong foundation in full-stack development, evidenced by my Full-stack Web Developer Certification from UC San Diego Extended Studies and ongoing education in Software Engineering at California State University San Marco, I bring a fresh and dynamic perspective to the tech industry.

); }; export default Intro;
